communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Video of  Warrantless  Forced Blood Draw performed on Robert Paul Patrick at CHP Oakland Golden Gate Division Office,  Oakland  California and warrant should you contend that Alameda County Superior Court and District Attorney are lying when they claim no warrant was applied for or issued on 3-18-23 when your office flagrantly violate the mans civil rights based on racial stereotypes and false arrest later to find no alcohol in his system.  . Policy regarding racial profiling as "victim"had clearly Irish surname and action preformed during "Saint Patricks Day Zero tolerance period" targeting a specific racial minority group during a religious holiday. Information about zero tolerance periods conducted toward other ethnic groups during religious holidays for example "Hanukkah" zero tolerance, and if not why?

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Joe Mama
